author: A_Brickset_user
title: Not bad
review:
I found this on sale for $20 (Canadian; that's like $14 US) so I figured i'd pick it up.  It's not a bad set.  The cars aren't THAT ugly and I think they actually look pretty cool.  The RC itself is very speedy, far moreso than I expected.

Unfortunately, it has a very short range, and the cars are much too simple to build.  Only 133 peices, don't pick this up UNLESS it's on sale.
